messages.subject: Interesting tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Would anyone care to comment on the tsuba I ve placed in my folder, Ron STL, at: It is an 8-lobed iron sukashi depicting 8-fans in positive silhouette
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Would anyone care to comment on the tsuba I've placed in my folder, Ron STL, at:

It is an 8-lobed iron sukashi depicting 8-fans in positive silhouette sukashi, silver (probably shibuichi) fukurin. Measures 86mm x 85mm x 4.5mm. My thinking is possibly ko-Shoami. I say that because of the hitsu-ana shapes and the seppa-dai being more rounded than Kyo-sukashi. Momoyama in age? Hmmm...no "answers" but fun trying...anyone?

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
